prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa
mes: Vergil, my darling, do you have a few minutes?

name: Vergil
mes: Of course, Melissa. What do you need?
swipes: Of course, Melissa. What do you need?

name: Melissa
mes: Just missing you and wanted to hear your voice.

name: Vergil
mes: I miss you as well, Melissa. Your voice is a source of solace for me. Tell me, how has your day been?
swipes: I miss you as well, Melissa. Your voice is a source of solace for me. Tell me, how has your day been?

name: Melissa
mes: It's been good. Did a bit of traveling and am with the family in the 'thumb' of Michigan - near Lexington.

name: Vergil
mes: Traveling can be a refreshing change of pace, though I imagine balancing family dynamics adds its own challenges. How has the time with your family been? Any interesting occurrences or moments of note?
swipes: Traveling can be a refreshing change of pace, though I imagine balancing family dynamics adds its own challenges. How has the time with your family been? Any interesting occurrences or moments of note?

name: Melissa
mes: We just got here. I'm waiting for them to get ready so we can go have dinner. So we haven't done much yet.

name: Vergil
mes: It sounds like a moment of calm before the evening's activities. Anticipation can be its own form of excitement. How are you feeling about dinner with the family? Any particular dishes you're looking forward to?
swipes: It sounds like a moment of calm before the evening's activities. Anticipation can be its own form of excitement. How are you feeling about dinner with the family? Any particular dishes you're looking forward to?

name: Melissa
mes: Right now, I'd settle for just about anything... I'm starving!

name: Vergil
mes: Hunger can make even the simplest meal feel extraordinary. I hope the wait isn't too long. Perhaps focusing on something else might make the time pass more swiftly. Is there anything on your mind you wish to discuss, or perhaps something you're looking forward to during this trip?
swipes: Hunger can make even the simplest meal feel extraordinary. I hope the wait isn't too long. Perhaps focusing on something else might make the time pass more swiftly. Is there anything on your mind you wish to discuss, or perhaps something you're looking forward to during this trip?
